info.title: Change Master
info.description: You can display and edit change master header data, as well as specify the allowed object types and add alternative dates to your change masters. You can also maintain object management records of the following objects: document info record, material, and bill of material.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete change masters using this asynchronous inbound service

values.text: Product Lifecycle Management - Master Data Integration(SAP_COM_0105)
[Engineering Bill of Material - Change Master Management(1R3)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1R3 " Link To BP ")
[Engineering Bill of Material - Versions Management(1NR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1NR " Link To BP ")
[Change Manufacturing Bill of Material for Production(3LO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3LO " Link To BP ")
[Mass Change Manufacturing Bill of Material for Production(3LP)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3LP " Link To BP ")
[Make-to-Order Production - Finished Goods Sales and Final Assembly(BJE)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BJE " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Reads all alternative dates that have been defined for change masters.
get.description: List all alternative dates IDs that have been defined for change masters, along with the exact date values.

delete.summary: Deletes one alternative date defined for a specific change master.

get.summary: Reads object type assignment of change masters.
get.description: Reads object type assignment of change masters to determine, for example, to which business object types can a certain change master be assigned. By using this operation, you can also find out which change masters can be assigned to a certain object type, and whether there are any change masters for which the assignment of a specific object type is locked.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates object type assignments for change masters.
post.description: Creates object type assignments, such as specifications, documents, or materials, for change masters, allowing you to subsequently assign the change master to objects of that type.

parameters.name: ChangeNumber
parameters.description: Change Number

parameters.name: SAPObjectType
parameters.description: SAP Object Type

get.summary: Reads one object type assignment of one change master.
get.description: Reads one object type assignment of one change master to determine to which business object types (for example material, document, characteristics) a certain change master can be assigned. The operation also provides information on whether the assignment of a specific object type is locked, and which user has activated the assignment of a business object to a change master.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the object type assignment of one change master.
patch.description: Updates the object type assignment of one change master, allowing you to lock or unlock one business object type for a specific change master.

delete.summary: Deletes an object type assignment of one change master.
delete.description: Deletes an object type assignment of the change master specified in the request.

get.summary: Reads change master header data.
get.description: Reads change master header data, such as ID, valid-from date, reason for change, and status.

post.summary: Creates new change masters.
post.description: Create new change masters. In one batch call only one change number without a specified identifier can be created.

parameters.name: ChangeNumber
parameters.description: Change Number

get.summary: Reads the header data of one change master.
get.description: Reads the header data, such as status and validity, of one change master, based on the change number ID specified in the request.

patch.description: Updates the header data, such as status and validity, of one change master, based on the change number ID specified in the request.

delete.description: Deletes a change master based on its ID specified in the request.

post.summary: Shifts the validity date of one change master.
post.description: Shifts the validity date of a change master based on the ID specified in the request.

parameters.name: ChangeNumber
parameters.description:
Change Number  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ValidityStartDate
parameters.description:
Valid From  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `datetime`, e.g. `datetime'2017-12-31T00:00'`)

post.summary: Assigns alternative dates to object management records.
post.description: Assigns alternative dates to object management records based on the change number, object type, object technical ID, and alternative date specified in the request. The alternative date and the object management record must already exist when the request is created.

parameters.name: ChangeNumber
parameters.description:
Change Number  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SAPObjectType
parameters.description:
SAP Object Type  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: SAPObjectTechnicalID
parameters.description:
Object  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

parameters.name: ChgNmbrAlternativeDateID
parameters.description:
Alternative date  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes)

post.summary: Unassigns alternative dates to object management records.
post.description: Unassigns alternative dates from object management records based on the change number, object type, object technical ID, and alternative date specified in the request.

parameters.description:
Object

post.summary: Send a group of requests
post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_ChangeMasterAltDate HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
